verses.verse: <S%H8104>Preserve<s%> <S%H410>me,<s%> God, for in you do I take <S%H2620>refuge.<s%>
My <S%H559>soul,<s%> you have said to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> "You are my <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> Apart from you I have no good <S%H2896>thing.<s%>"
As for the <S%H6918>saints<s%> <S%H1992>who<s%> are in the <S%H776>earth,<s%> they are the <S%H117>excellent<s%> ones in whom is all my <S%H2656>delight.<s%>

Their <S%H6094>sorrows<s%> shall be <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> who <S%H4116>give<s%> gifts to <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H5262>god.<s%> Their drink offerings of <S%H1818>blood<s%> I will not <S%H5258>offer,<s%> <S%H1077>nor<s%> <S%H5375>take<s%> their <S%H8034>names<s%> on my <S%H8193>lips.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H2506>assigned<s%> my <S%H4490>portion<s%> and my <S%H3563>cup.<s%> You <S%H8551>made<s%> my lot <S%H1486>secure.<s%>
The <S%H2256>lines<s%> have <S%H5307>fallen<s%> to me in <S%H5273>pleasant<s%> <S%H8231>places.<s%> Yes, I have a good <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>
I will <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> who has given me <S%H3289>counsel.<s%> <S%H3629>Yes,<s%> my heart <S%H3256>instructs<s%> me in the night <S%H3915>seasons.<s%>
I have <S%H7737>set<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H8548>always<s%> before <S%H3225>me.<s%> Because he is at my right hand, I shall not be <S%H4131>moved.<s%>
Therefore my <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H8055>glad,<s%> and my <S%H3519>tongue<s%> <S%H1523>rejoices.<s%> My <S%H1320>body<s%> shall also <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in <S%H983>safety.<s%>
For you will not <S%H5800>leave<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> in <S%H7585>Sheol,<s%> neither will you <S%H5414>allow<s%> your holy <S%H2623>one<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H7845>corruption.<s%>

You will <S%H3045>show<s%> me the <S%H734>path<s%> of <S%H2416>life.<s%> In your <S%H6440>presence<s%> is <S%H7648>fullness<s%> of <S%H8057>joy.<s%> In your right <S%H3225>hand<s%> there are <S%H5273>pleasures<s%> <S%H5331>forevermore.<s%>
